alert.note: Alert for Clackamas; Marion (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 08 at 12:59PM PST until January 10 at 6:20AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon... Pudding River at Aurora affecting Clackamas and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pudding River at Aurora. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Above 22.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low-lying agricultural lands and access roads along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM PST Saturday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 22.2 feet late tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM PST.
